SoundClassifierTF.Name: Sound Classifier (TensorFlow)
SoundClassifierTF.Description: The sound classifier uses Tensorflow with Python to classify sound files based on the UrbanSound8K dataset.

RouteMaps.Name: Sound Classifier
RouteMaps.Description: Classify sound files based on the UrbanSound8K dataset.

Inputs.Name: sound
Inputs.Description: The HTTP file object (WAV sound file) to be analyzed.

Inputs.Name: min_confidence
Inputs.Description: The minimum confidence level for successful classification. In the range 0.0 to 1.0. Default 0.4.

Outputs.Name: label
Outputs.Description: The classification label of the sound.

Outputs.Name: confidence
Outputs.Description: The confidence in the classification in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.

Outputs.Name: command
Outputs.Description: The command that was sent as part of this request. Can be classify, list, status.

Outputs.Name: moduleId
Outputs.Description: The Id of the module that processed this request.

Outputs.Name: executionProvider
Outputs.Description: The name of the device or package handling the inference. eg CPU, GPU, TPU, DirectML.

Outputs.Name: canUseGPU
Outputs.Description: True if this module can use the current GPU if one is present.

Outputs.Name: inferenceMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to perform the AI inference.

Outputs.Name: processMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) to process the image (includes inference and image manipulation operations).

Outputs.Name: analysisRoundTripMs
Outputs.Description: The time (ms) for the round trip to the analysis module and back.
